verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2316>God's<s%> <S%G1588>elect,<s%> and the <S%G1922>acknowledging<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G2150>godliness;<s%>

But has in <S%G2398>due<s%> <S%G5550>times<s%> <S%G5319>manifested<s%> his <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G2782>preaching,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G4100>committed<s%> to me <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G4990>Savior;<s%>

To <S%G5103>Titus,<s%> my <S%G1103>own<s%> <S%G5043>son<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G2839>common<s%> <S%G4102>faith:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace,<s%> <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G4990>Savior.<s%>

For <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G5484>cause<s%> <S%G2641>left<s%> I you in <S%G2914>Crete,<s%> that you should <S%G1930>set<s%> in <S%G1930>order<s%> the things that are <S%G3007>wanting,<s%> and <S%G2525>ordain<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> in <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> as I had <S%G1299>appointed<s%> you:

For a <S%G1985>bishop<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G410>blameless,<s%> as the <S%G3622>steward<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> not <S%G829>self-willed,<s%> not <S%G3711>soon<s%> <S%G3711>angry,<s%> not <S%G3943>given<s%> to <S%G3943>wine,<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4131>striker,<s%> not given to <S%G150>filthy<s%> <S%G146>lucre;<s%>
But a <S%G5382>lover<s%> of <S%G5382>hospitality,<s%> a <S%G5358>lover<s%> of <S%G5358>good<s%> men, <S%G4998>sober,<s%> <S%G1342>just,<s%> <S%G3741>holy,<s%> <S%G1468>temperate;<s%>

<S%G472>Holding<s%> <S%G472>fast<s%> the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> as he has been <S%G1322>taught,<s%> that he may be <S%G1415>able<s%> by <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G3870>exhort<s%> and to <S%G1651>convince<s%> the <S%G483>disputers.<s%>
For there are <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G506>unruly<s%> and <S%G3151>vain<s%> <S%G3151>talkers<s%> and <S%G5423>deceivers,<s%> <S%G3122>specially<s%> they of the <S%G4061>circumcision:<s%>

<S%G3739>Whose<s%> <S%G1993>mouths<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G1993>stopped,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G396>subvert<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3624>houses,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> things <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G1163>ought<s%> not, for <S%G150>filthy<s%> <S%G2771>lucre's<s%> sake.

<S%G5100>One<s%> of <S%G846>themselves,<s%> even a <S%G4396>prophet<s%> of their <S%G2398>own,<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> The <S%G2912>Cretians<s%> are <S%G104>always<s%> <S%G5583>liars,<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G2342>beasts,<s%> <S%G692>slow<s%> <S%G1064>bellies.<s%>
<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G3141>witness<s%> is <S%G227>true.<s%> <S%G1223>Why<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1651>rebuke<s%> them <S%G664>sharply,<s%> that they may be <S%G5198>sound<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith;<s%>
Not giving <S%G4337>heed<s%> to <S%G2451>Jewish<s%> <S%G3454>fables,<s%> and <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> that <S%G654>turn<s%> from the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

To the <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things are <S%G2513>pure:<s%> but to them that are <S%G3392>defiled<s%> and <S%G571>unbelieving<s%> is <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G2513>pure;<s%> but <S%G2532>even<s%> their <S%G3563>mind<s%> and <S%G4893>conscience<s%> is <S%G3392>defiled.<s%>

They <S%G3670>profess<s%> that they <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> but in <S%G2041>works<s%> they <S%G720>deny<s%> him, <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G947>abominable,<s%> and <S%G545>disobedient,<s%> and to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G96>reprobate.<s%>
